22815787,s6,T14,T5,Here we explore the specificity of the molecular interaction between ,L1CAM, and the ,erbB, receptor family.,Complex_formation
22815787,s7,T15,T6,We show that ,L1CAM, binds physically ,erbB, receptors in both heterologous systems and the mammalian developing brain.,Complex_formation
